review: Its a nice palette at this price range. Its pigmented and the colours are beautiful.

The formula of matte shades is good. The shimmery shades barely show up on medium skin tone. Pigmentation is average as compared to other products in the similar price range. Overall it is an average palette. There are better options available with other brands, or the new city mini palettes are also better than this.

So I bought the Iconic 3 palette, and before that I had the Romantic Smoked palette. I'm not the kind of person who uses eyeshadow for an everyday look, but if you do, then this would be a great pick. It's subtle and not too overwhelming. The colours in the Iconic 3 palette are really beautiful! I found it so much better than the Maybelline Nudes (The rose gold one). The Romantic Smoked palette, I used more than I thought I would. It's got more mattes, the pigment isn't great for eyeshadows in this one, but I've used the grey and brown shades to fill in my eyebrows a bunch of times. So I feel like I got the use out of it. The only thing, theres brands like Wet and Wild out there or even LA girl that have quads for a lesser price that I think are better, pigment wise.
I am just in love with this eyeshadow palette, it has both matte and shimmery shades which i like the most. Well pigmented, it doesn't fall off. Over all it's a very good product.

My routine was using the facial cleanser in the morning, followed by the toner and facial cream; at night I would use the Scrub/Mask in place of the Cleanser. I incorporated the serum into my skin care ritual at night and was thrilled with the results!

I was concerned that the Serum wouldn't moisturize my skin enough, but that was not the case whatsoever. After a few days of use, I noticed my tiny acne scars and discolorations fading, leaving my skin clearer with a more even tone. The results were so pleasing, I started using it twice a day, in the morning and at night, in place of the cream. In my years of battling acne, my skin has never been clearer! I am extremely happy with the Natural Vibes line, in general, and over the moon with the serum !
